thread.title: Texas Tech's New Practice Facility Caught Fire
thread.title_full: Texas Tech's New Practice Facility Caught Fire

author: Patrick Redford
title: Texas Tech's New Practice Facility Caught Fire
text:
Go to permalink 
The biggest news that Texas Tech football made this offseason was their bizarre inclusion in a tortured analogy during the FBIâ€™s Russia hearing. That is, until this afternoon, when a fire broke out at their football stadium . The school is in the process of constructing a new athletic facility right next to the stadium, and observers initially claimed that the stadium itself was on fire. 
Nobody was injured in the fire, per the school , and it has been contained. Texas Tech said that they were still determining the cause of the blaze and the extent of the damages. Recommended Stories
